# Rgadgets

The goal of Rgadgets is to store useful functions and potentially also some datasets that are needed frequently for data analysis.

## Installation

You can install the released version of Rgadgets from [github](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github('sitscholl/Rgadgets')
```
